claim: Logan Lerman starred in The Perks of Being a Wallflower (2012) as Charlie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He subsequently played d'Artagnan in 2011 's The Three Musketeers , starred in the coming-of-age dramas The Perks of Being a Wallflower  (  2012  )  , Indignation  (  2016  )  and Sidney Hall  (  2017  )  , and had major roles in the 2014 films Noah and Fury .

claim: Logan Lerman starred in The Perks of Being a Wallflower (2012) as Charlie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Stephen Chbosky  (  -LSB- ʃəˈbɒski -RSB- born January 25 , 1970  )  is an American novelist , screenwriter , and film director best known for writing The New York Times bestselling coming-of-age novel The Perks of Being a Wallflower  (  1999  )  , as well as for screenwriting and directing the film version of the same book , starring Logan Lerman , Emma Watson , and Ezra Miller .
